Package com.flipkart.business

Class FlipFitAdminService

java.lang.Object
com.flipkart.business.FlipFitAdminService
All Implemented Interfaces:
FlipFitAdminInterface
public class FlipFitAdminService extends Object implements FlipFitAdminInterface
Provides business logic for administrative tasks including approving or rejecting gym owners and gyms, and managing gym and owner data.
